institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 30 (Monitoring of supported companies)
contents: Article 30 (Monitoring of supported companies) ① The head of the affiliated agency shall utilize the small and medium-sized learning support system to regularly monitor the learning organization activity details and performance, project cost execution details, etc. of the supported company., ② The head of the affiliated agency shall monitor the supported company during the project period. On-site inspections must be conducted at least once a quarter., ③ The head of the affiliated institution must monitor the appropriateness of project cost execution by checking documents supporting project cost execution and monitoring the grant management system., ④ The head of the affiliated institution must hold a learning group launching ceremony for the supported company. , Observation of learning group meetings, excellent learning activities, in-house learning group competitions, etc., and participation by secretaries of councils can be carried out in parallel with or replaced with on-site inspection., ⑤ If the results of monitoring the supporting company are inadequate, the head of the affiliated organization may take necessary measures, such as corrective action. must take action, and important matters must be reported to the chairman.
